actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Anthra[2,1,9-mna]naphth[2,3-h]acridine-5,10,15(16H)-trione,3  [(9,10-dihydro-9,10-dioxo-1-anthracenyl)amino]-.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2005, the duty on the dye Anthra.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Anthra[2,1,9-mna]naphth[2,3-h]acridine-5,10,15(16H)-trione,3  [(9,10-dihydro-9,10-dioxo-1-anthracenyl)amino]-.
